issues.message: A "NullPointerException" could be thrown; "itemClass" is nullable here.
25 duplicated blocks of code must be removed.
Do not use "undefined" to declare a parameter - use another name.
Replace the type specification in this constructor call with the diamond operator ("<>"). (sonar.java.source not set. Assuming 7 or greater.)
